Content: There should be organizations permitted to own buildings within
colonies, to simualte monastic orders, mega-corporations or trad
guilds. This buildings would then point to the organization, which

could build on them.
I think I solved this issue in a different
particle with concessions, so a polity can hand over part of a colony
to another polity which can then build a trade-quarter, an embassy
or a military base on the land. Essentially forming a mini-colony
